mapper.sql: NICE_NAME AS niceName, VERSION AS version, PROGRAM AS program
mapper.select: select a.version as version, case when b.nice_name is null then a.version else b.NICE_NAME end as nice_name from petshow.job_runtime a left join nice_name_map b on a.VERSION = b.VERSION where a.VERSION like CONCAT(#{bigVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'.%') and a.ARRAY_NAME= #{arrayName} group by version,NICE_NAME
